threat: These certificates could allow  an attacker to perform a "man in the middle" (MITM) attack which would make  the user believe their connection is secure, but is actually being  monitored..
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
After a standard system update you need to restart any applications that
use NSS, such as Thunderbird or Evolution, to make all the necessary
changes.
